author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Ng Chan Teng v Keppel Singmarine Dockyard Pte Ltd
counsel: Namasivayam Srinivasan (Hoh Law Corporation) for the plaintiff; Anparasan s/o Kamachi (KhattarWong) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Courts and Jurisdiction/District court/Jurisdiction in actions of contract and tort/Statutory limit for damages/Tortfeasor accepting 70% liability in consent interlocutory judgment/Whether victim could recover 70% of damages assessed capped at statutory limit or only 70% of statutory limit/Section 20 Subordinate Courts Act (Cap 321, 2007 Rev Ed)
